trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
Provides initialization for base class values when called by the constructor of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스의 생성자에서 호출 될 때 기본 클래스 값의 초기화를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>.

When overridden in a derived class, creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for a data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면의 새 인스턴스를 만듭니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"> </xref> 데이터 항목에 대해는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>이 컬렉션 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The data item that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
The new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> created.
Returns an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified object.
The item to get an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for.
trans-unit.target: 가져올 항목을 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"> </xref> 에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified object.

Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 자식 요소 컬렉션을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref> 이와 연결 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
The collection of child elements.

Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 패턴을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"> </xref> 이와 연결 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref> should return <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> objects for child items that are not virtualized.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"> </xref> 반환 해야 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> 가상화 되었는지 자식 항목에 대 한 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref> should return <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> objects for child items that are not virtualized; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref> should return <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> objects all child items.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"> </xref> 반환할지 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> 가상화 되었는지; 하위 항목에 대 한 개체 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> 경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"> </xref> 반환할지 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> 모든 자식 항목 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an element by the specified property value.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 속성 값으로 요소를 검색 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IItemContainerProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IItemContainerProvider>인터페이스.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IItemContainerProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The item in the container after which to begin the search.
The property that contains the value to retrieve.
The value to retrieve.
The first item that matches the search criterion; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no items match.
trans-unit.target: 첫 번째 일치 하는 항목 검색 조건입니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 일치 하는 항목이 없는 경우.
